org.gvsig.chart

Interface ChartService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Persistent, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChart, AbstractXYChart, BarsChart, OverlayChart, PieChart, TemporalChart, XYPlotChart

    public interface ChartService
extends Service, Persistent, Cloneable
    This class represent a Chart and provides all the method to manage it. It is defined by a ChartProperties that contains its characteristics.
    See Also:
    ChartProperties

      • getInnerChart

        Object getInnerChart()
        Useful to swing part. The idea is: If someone wants to implement his own ChartService using un underlaying library, the main object can be reached by this method. In our case, the object will be a JFreeChart, but if not, the Swing library can make its own cast.
        Returns:
        the inner object that the library uses to render.

      • getRenderer

        ChartRenderer getRenderer()
        It gets the renderer used to drawn the chart.
        Returns:
        the ChartService's renderer

      • getChartRenderers

        Map<String,ChartRenderer> getChartRenderers()
        With this method, you can get all the available renderers to this type of ChartService.
        Returns:
        a Map with an ID and the Renderer.

      • getChartRenderer

        ChartRenderer getChartRenderer()
        Returns a ChartRenderer using its ID
        Parameters:
        ChartRenderer's - name
        Returns:
        the ChartRenderer with the ID indicated in the name
